title: Vatican Court Convicts Cardinal Becciu of Embezzlement in Landmark Trial
description: A Vatican cardinal and former advisor to Pope Francis was convicted of embezzlement and sentenced to five-and-a-half years in prison.

title: U.S. and Britain Say Their Navies Shot Down 15 Attack Drones Over the Red Sea
description: A U.S. warship shot down 14 suspected attack drones over the Red Sea on Saturday, and a Royal Navy destroyer downed another drone that was targeting commercial ships, the British and American militaries said.

title: Quaker Oats Recalls Several Granola Bars and Cereals Nationwide Over Salmonella Risk
description: The Quaker Oats Company recalled several granola bars and cereals over a potential risk of contamination with Salmonella.

title: Kuwait Leader Sheikh Nawaf Al-Ahmad Al-Jaber Al-Sabah Dies Aged 86
description: Sheikh Nawaf Al-Ahmad Al-Jaber Al-Sabah, leader of the Gulf Nation of Kuwait, died on Saturday, Dec. 16.

title: Waiting for Iron Man in Gaza
description: "I wish I could turn back that Israeli snap and go back to my life before Oct. 7," writes Amal Murtaja.
